ygData.subject: Re: Farewell Atlantis
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson remains beside Lord Perseus, curious to find out what he might have missed during his forced stasis and re awakening. Apparently it was quite a bit.

Tucson remains beside Lord Perseus, curious to find out what he might have =
missed during his forced stasis and re awakening. Apparently it was quite a=
 bit.  

" Lord Perseus, I'm afraid I don't understand fully as to what is =
going on..  I'm too quick to blame the Decepticons for what's happening.  I=
've missed quite a bit during my forced stasis which I have no idea as to h=
ow long I'd been off line.  When I came to Atlantis, I was just looking for=
 a place where I could recover and try to forget the wounds of war.  For a =
long time I did.  Then, I started finding curious artifacts around the isla=
nd and found solace in restoring them.  I - guess I hate to see things bein=
g destroyed, when I know how long it takes to make them.  I've kept myself =
in the dark far too long, and I'd like to know what's happening and for wha=
t reason it is happening.  Once I understand what I've been missing, I assu=
re you I'll help you to the greatest of my abilities."   

He turns his hea=
d in the direction of the  front of the ship, where he can hear the hum of =
the equipment.

" Even if it means putting my own spark at risk."  

He rem=
ains close by to Lord Perseus, doing what Autobots do best. Serve and prote=
ct the innocent.
